resources.string: Stop the routine and return to the home base

This is where I would display system diagnostics, state or help info..

You can get Temi to follow you by tapping it on the top of the head. It will stop following you if it can't find you, or if you tap it on the top of the head again.

To manage LOCATIONS, terminate this app and return to the Launcher. Go to the apps menu [icon] and click on "Locations". From there you can tap the ... to edit saved locations.

Reminder: Temi will patrol by cycling through all saved locations in order, except for the home base. Please do not delete the home base location.
Scan the QR code with your device to access the Online User Manual.
